comments.body: I haven't referenced this script in any documentation yet, I think as part of this SPIP we should add some high level descriptions about how it all flows - SPARK-27492

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@#

ADDRS=`nvidia-smi --query-gpu=index --format=csv,noheader | sed 'N;s/\n/,/'`
COUNT=`echo $ADDRS | tr -cd , | wc -c`
ALLCOUNT=`expr $COUNT + 1`
